name: Party Hard 2: Alien Butt Form
storyline: The plotline of the DLC is to find out who has been behind all the killings–suggesting someone, or some…thing was controlling the original killer. Without getting too heavy, Alien Butt Form dumps you right into the thick of it, giving you a new female character that packs a punch (quite literally!). Aside from her, there’s a couple of new personalities to dive into, a tie for my favorite being the ankle biter dog, Mango and the psychedelic madness that is Froger.
summary: Something has been very wrong with parties in the city of Aho Bay recently. Who really controlled Party Hard Killer? Why it took so long for the police to catch him? Where are those tentacles grown from, for Christ’s sake? Find out in this brand new DLC, fueled by booze and hilarity.

videos.title: Party Hard 2: Alien Butt Form DLC Launch Trailer - out now on Steam!
